subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Chris Bosh got away with contact on the Wizards’ Kirk Hinrich on a potential game-winning layup, letting the Heat escape with a 95-94 win on Saturday.
snippet: LeBron James and Chris Bosh got away with contact on the Wizards’ Kirk Hinrich on a potential game-winning layup, letting the Heat escape with a 95-94 win on Saturday.
